skilllist.skilldesc:
After casting a skill, Kalea creates a <font color="a6aafb">Water Zone</font> on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:
First Basic Attack: Kalea dashes to the target, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.
Second Basic Attack: Kalea unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and recovering 120<font color="26e407"> (+10% Total HP)</font>  <font color="62f8fe">(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for herself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP.
Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and creating a new <font color="a6aafb">Water Zone</font>. Enhanced Basic Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed.

Kalea slams her fist into the ground, creating a wave that deals 250<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slows them by 40% for 1.5s.

Kalea charges forward and body slams the first enemy hero she encounters, knocking them airborne for 0.6s while dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.
If she collides with an obstacle or touches the edge of a <font color="a6aafb">Water Zone</font> during her charge, Kalea will leap into the air. Cast the skill again to slam down at a target location, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s.

Kalea grabs an enemy hero with her tail and slams them down in the Joystick's direction (drag the Joystick to change landing spot). She gains Control Immunity during this process. Upon landing, deals 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and nearby enemies.

data.name: Kalea

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Movement Speed in the Jungle and River is increased by 10%. This bonus is halved when in combat with enemy heroes, Lord or Turtle.

After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Dire Hit: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>

recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: With her serpent tail, this proud descendant of the Great Serpent swims gracefully through the Vonetis Sea, aspiring to one day carry the full power of her heritage.

assist.desc: Kalea's strong single-target CC makes her work well with heroes who have high single-target burst, like Eudora, Harley, and Clint.

strong.desc: Kalea counters heroes who lack mobility like Layla and Chang'e.

weak.desc: However, Kalea cannot grab enemies with Control Immunity, so heroes like Diggie and Minotaur can effectively counter her.
